name: PumpkinJamProject
description: This very early development project was inspired by the Cozy Autumn Jam 2022. Play through a beautifully designed environment with fall colors. Complete tasks like harvesting pumpkins and foraging for spices to craft the perfect cup of pumpkin spice coffee. Find a boat to float down the river to talk with other villages. If you want to sit and enjoy the view, just find a seat on a bench and watch with your little feline companion.
